question: Claire and Kenneth have 31 minutes to walk to the bank together. It takes them 8 minutes to get to the corner where the library is. It takes them another 13 minutes to get to the school. How much longer do they have to get to bank without being late?
answer:
Claire and Kenneth arrive at the library with 31 - 8 = <<31-8=23>>23 minutes left to reach the school.
They then arrive at the school and have 23 - 13 = <<23-13=10>>10 minutes left to get to bank without being late.
#### 10
